name: A. Juicer
statement:
Kolya is going to make fresh orange juice. He has oranges of sizes .
Kolya will put them in the juicer in the fixed order, starting with
orange of size , then orange of size and so on. To be put in the juicer
the orange must have size not exceeding , so if Kolya sees an orange
that is strictly greater he throws it away and continues with the next
one.The juicer has a special section to collect waste. It overflows if
Kolya squeezes oranges of the total size strictly greater than . When it
happens Kolya empties the waste section (even if there are no more
oranges) and continues to squeeze the juice. How many times will he have
to empty the waste section?
